subSubSection.paragraph: The SK females were captured in June from unspecified habitat. In NL, adults were captured from June to September in the litter of a riparian forest and along the shore of a pond ( Klimaszewski et al. 2011 ). Elsewhere, adults were captured in leaf litter near the margin of a brook in a red maple swamp, in mixed forests of different ages, in river debris, gopher burrows, and under decaying seaweed on a seashore ( Klimaszewski and Winchester 2002 , Klimaszewski et al. 2005 , Majka and Klimaszewski 2008, Webster et al. 2009 ). Adult activity occurs from April to September.
